## dateTimeToString() function

Converts a date time object to a string.

Either a single date (2020-07-19T23:59:59) or a range (2019-07-19T00:00:00 --<!-- -->&gt; 2020-07-19T23:59:59).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function dateTimeToString(dateTime: DateTime | DateTimeRange): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dateTime | [DateTime](./stentor-models.datetime.md) \| [DateTimeRange](./stentor-models.datetimerange.md) | Either DateTime or DateTimeRange to convert to a string |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
